properties.areaDesc: Tallapoosa, AL; Chambers, AL; Elmore, AL; Randolph, AL; Macon, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 13 at 8:31AM CST until February 14 at 10:30PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Tallapoosa River At Wadley Affecting Chambers...Elmore...Macon...
Randolph and Tallapoosa Counties.

.Rises are occurring on the Tallapoosa River at Wadley...and a flood
warning is now in effect there for minor flooding.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Tallapoosa River At Wadley.
* until Friday evening...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At  8:00 AM Thursday The stage Was 13.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 130 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 14 feet by this
evening. The river will fall below flood stage late Friday morning.
* Impact...At 13 feet...Flooding of pasture lands in the area occurs
and cattle and farm equipment should be moved to higher ground if
higher stages are forecast.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Friday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
